医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Cedars-Sinai 如何不断改善患者从入住到出院的互动Cedars-Sinai 正在举办 2024 年患者体验周活动，以纪念团队成员及其每天对患者生活产生的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/How-Cedars-Sinai-continuously-improves-病人-interactions-from-check-in-to-discharge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/How-Cedars-Sinai-continuously-improves-病人-interactions-from-check-in-to-discharge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c654410-cec0-4dca-b230-c7b0b741731e Mon, 29 Apr 2024 15:18:00 -0400 How Cedars-Sinai continuously improves patients' interactions from check-in to discharge
世界上第一个用于医疗过程中高光谱成像的刚性内窥镜系统高光谱成像 (HSI) 是一种最先进的技术，可以捕获和处理给定电磁频谱的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Worlds-first-rigid-endoscopy-system-for-hyperspectral-imaging-during-medical-procedures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Worlds-first-rigid-endoscopy-system-for-hyperspectral-imaging-during-medical-procedures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98266e67-4c29-4895-8ae7-fa3d4343cd14 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 15:08:40 -0400 World's first rigid endoscope system for hyperspectral imaging during medical procedures
酶的发现为开发通用供血铺平了道路DTU 和隆德大学的研究人员发现了一些酶，可以消除阻碍通用捐献血液开发的障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Enzyme-discovery-paves-the-way-for-developing-universal-donor-blood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Enzyme-discovery-paves-the-way-for-developing-universal-donor-blood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e66621a4-02bc-4b29-af9a-ec8a7964e88f Mon, 29 Apr 2024 15:03:00 -0400 Enzyme discovery paves the way for developing universal donor blood
研究发现联邦合格健康中心的癌症筛查使用存在重大差距由德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和新墨西哥大学 (UNM) 综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项全国性研究发现，美国联邦合格健康中心 (FQHC) 在乳腺癌、宫颈癌和结直肠癌筛查使用方面存在重大差距，相对于该国的总体筛查率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Study-finds-major-gaps-in-cancer-screening-use-in-Federally-Qualified-Health-Centers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Study-finds-major-gaps-in-cancer-screening-use-in-Federally-Qualified-Health-Centers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9820ddc5-2353-45da-baf7-0681a1eb4007 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 14:46:37 -0400 Study finds major gaps in cancer screening use in Federally Qualified Health Centers
将疗养院居民纳入临床试验的好处和挑战我们不断设计临床试验并招募研究参与者，以确定药物治疗和疗法是否安全有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Benefits-and-challenges-of-integrating-nursing-home-residents-into-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Benefits-and-challenges-of-integrating-nursing-home-residents-into-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6403badd-80eb-4b3f-9733-95031dccd171 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 14:38:29 -0400 Benefits and challenges of integrating nursing home residents into clinical trials
使用改进的奶嘴技术和人工智能算法评估新生儿护理力学最近的一项研究表明，经过改进的安抚奶嘴和人工智能算法来分析其产生的数据可以确定新生儿是否正在学习正确的护理技巧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Assessing-newborn-nursing-mechanics-with-modified-pacifier-technology-and-AI-algorithms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Assessing-newborn-nursing-mechanics-with-modified-pacifier-technology-and-AI-algorithms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4649dcde-158a-41c6-85a4-0fa440a80af1 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 14:32:21 -0400 Assessing newborn nursing mechanics with modified pacifier technology and AI algorithms
基于Hep25/FP系统的原发性铁过载综合征的新分类hepcidin25 (Hep25) 的临床引入使人们更详细地了解其与原发性铁过载综合征 (PIOS) 中铁转运蛋白 (FP) 和二价金属转运蛋白 1 的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Renewed-classification-of-primary-iron-overload-syndromes-based-on-Hep25FP-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Renewed-classification-of-primary-iron-overload-syndromes-based-on-Hep25FP-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b58c82a0-cd47-4896-a38e-2a0a4a40dc24 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 14:11:16 -0400 Renewed classification of primary iron overload syndromes based on Hep25/FP system

美国心脏协会资助四个新项目来评估种族在预测心脏病风险中的作用由于健康风险计算器和其他帮助临床医生做出治疗决策的工具如何解释种族，心脏病患者可能会接受不同的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/American-Heart-Association-funds-four-new-projects-to-evaluate-the-role-of-race-in-predicting-heart-disease-风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/American-Heart-Association-funds-four-new-projects-to-evaluate-the-role-of-race-in-predicting-heart-disease- risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6f40fe4-33d3-45ed-8362-f27ff944d644 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 13:43:54 -0400 American Heart Association funds four new projects to evaluate the role of race in predicting heart disease risk
心力衰竭 2024：心力衰竭管理领域的尖端科学和激发讨论欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 的科学大会 Heart Failure 2024 上将呈现心力衰竭管理方面的尖端科学和激动人心的讨论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Heart-Failure-2024-Cutting-edge-science-and-stimulate-discussions-in-heart-failure-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Heart-Failure-2024-Cutting-edge-science-and-stimulate-discussions-in-heart-failure-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=465ca526-e46c-493d-a620-62a78a495b58 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 13:37:00 -0400 Heart Failure 2024: Cutting-edge science and stimulating discussions in heart failure management
